open_source_contributions.title: Chrome OS Hardware Video Decoding Validation
open_source_contributions.description: Contributed to improving hardware video decoding validation for tiled formats in Chrome OS. Demonstrated understanding of VA-API, display modifiers, and GPU-accelerated media stacks.
open_source_contributions.impact: Enhanced video processing capabilities for Chrome OS platform

open_source_contributions.title: Linux Kernel FP16 Compression Support
open_source_contributions.description: Contributed a patch to the upstream Linux kernel enabling FP16 (16-bit floating point) compression format support for Intel's Meteor Lake (MTL) display engine in the i915 graphics driver.
open_source_contributions.impact: Improved graphics performance and efficiency for Intel platforms
